p: The approach we take, based on previous work [ 34, 35], is to model the direct estimate (in the language of Small Area Estimation (SAE), see [ 36]) of U5MR by decomposing the underlying mean of this estimate into space and time components. This discrete model approach has a long and successful history in spatial epidemiology [ 37, 38]. Statistical analysis proceeded in two steps as described by Mercer et al [ 11]. Full details can be found in the supporting information file S1 File.
